created_at_min.description: Start date and time of the record created (format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00, default: 24hrs ago)

created_at_max.description: End date and time of the record created (format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00, default: NOW())
